subject: Basketball (College)
National Invitation Tournament
lead_paragraph: Temple, Old Dominion, Colorado State and Richmond, the top seeds in the N.I.T., will be joined in the field by last year’s N.C.A.A. champion, Connecticut, among others.
snippet: Temple, Old Dominion, Colorado State and Richmond, the top seeds in the N.I.T., will be joined in the field by last year’s N.C.A.A. champion, Connecticut, among others.
